channel.title: [REQ] Help please i need someone to show me how to get npc's to buy mapel logs
channel.description: hi im requesting some help.. i would like to make it so on my server when i have 10 mapel logs in my inventory the npc will buy them off me for 100k "100,00,00gp" Please Help...And cool i got it in the right section :D

item.title: [REQ] Help please i need someone to show me how to get npc's to buy mapel logs
item.dc:creator: @CryptoScape CryptoScape
item.description:
@CryptoScape wrote:

start whit deleting the other code

now add this whit youre other if npc in first click void

else if (NPCID == 2244 && playerHasItemAmount(1517, 10)==true) { PutNPCCoords = true; addItem(995, 100000); sendQuest("@whi@Thanks heres your 100k@whi@",1106); }
just under that

else if (NPCID == 2244 && playerHasItemAmount(1517, 10)==false) { PutNPCCoords = true; sendQuest("@whi@Bring me 10 maple logs,il pay you good.@whi@",1106); }
under that add

else if (NPCID == 2244 && playerHasItemAmount(1518, 10)==true) { PutNPCCoords = true; sendQuest("@whi@Can you unnote the logs please.@whi@",1106); }

this will make it so whenyou talk to the lumbyguide dick that he wants you to bring 10 maple logs

and if you have 10 maple logs he will give you 100k

and if you have 10 noted maples he will tel you to unote them

if you dont want it to be the lumby guide change this

else if (NPCID == 2244

dont forget to reply and if you get errors post it here

[br][size=1]Posted at: August 11, 2006, 12:11:02 PM[/size][hr]oops i fixed some errors and tested it and works[br][size=1]Posted at: August 11, 2006, 12:28:01 PM[/size][hr][quote=“xerlot, post:14, topic:8898”]kk[/quote]wow ure a rlly nice person not ev3n a thank you…damn leechers these times

Read full topic

@CryptoScape wrote:

[quote=“philip_l_g, post:6, topic:8898”]well i can show you… put this is client.java:

if(playerHasItemAmount(maplelogidhere, 10))
{
addItem(995, 100000);
 sendQuest("@whi@Thanks heres your 100k@whi@",1106);
}

but youwould need if player talks to blah blah i will edit this post soon to fit it[br][size=1]Posted at: August 11, 2006, 06:45:44 AM[/size][hr]does the lummy guide already say something?[/quote]
you forgot the delete item (for the 10 maples)
